name: HerpesTestsForHerpesSimplexVirusNucleicAcid
title: Herpes (Tests for Herpes simplex virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Herpes simplex virus Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Herpes simplex),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
